email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider something in the high 40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability and any demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve checked with the owner, and we can offer a revised rate of $49.75 per ton. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for the laycan. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. We’re almost there—could you do $49.50 per ton? Also, can we cap the demurrage at 3 days? Let me know if we can finalize this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can agree to $49.50 per ton. Demurrage will be capped at 3 days as requested. If this works, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Please proceed with drafting the agreement. Let’s aim to finalize by end of day. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John
